item.description:
UPDATE ON DIRECTIONS: In the front yard, you will see a Love Joy Real Estate sign.

The success of the latest cookout was such a hit that we thought we would have another one. Dave's place is right off of 125 and is about 4 miles south of the Hudson household...

Burgers, dogs, chicken, etc. will be served...please BYOB and sides as well as lawn chairs, etc.

See you there...

We will try to give 24 hours notice if the weather looks like it's going to be bad.
item.name: Cookout at Mincin's
